author: GameSpot
description:
We got a better grasp of what the future holds for the Nintendo Switch and Switch 2 from the latest Nintendo Direct. We got big news about Metroid Prime 4: Beyond's release date, the reveal of Fire Emblem: Fortune's Weave, Resident Evil Requiem making its way to Switch 2, and much more. Kurt Indovina breaks down what we learned from the Direct and the impact for the consoles into the future. Check out timestamps below for our thoughts on the various announcements below.

#gamespot #nintendodirect 

0:00 Intro
0:25 4 Major Takeaways
1:38 Mario 40th Anniversary Celebration
1:50 The Super Mario Galaxy Movie
2:22 Super Mario Galaxy 1+2
3:21 Mario Tennis Fever
4:15 Super Mario Brothers Wonder Switch 2 Edition
5:00 Switch 1 Games 
5:10 Tomadachi Life Living The Dream
5:45 Yoshi and the Mysterious Book
6:31 Hades 2 1.0
6:54 Kirby Air Riders
7:36 Hyrule Warriors Age of Imprisonment
8:57 Pokopia
10:00 Virtua Boy Nintendo Classics 
12:26 Stardew Valley 
12:59 Fatal Frame 2 
13:17 Danganronpa 2
title: Nintendo Isn’t Showing All Its Cards With The Switch 2 (For The Better)

author: GameSpot
description: Here's a tip for all the OG Hollow Knight player. If you're used to the old pogo, and the new pogo is messing up your muscle memory, this tip may lessen your frustration.
title: How to Control the Diagonal Pogo

author: GameSpot
description: Tune in for Critical Reflex's new showcase, highlighting upcoming games from the publisher.
title: CRITICAL REFLEX TIME Showcase

author: GameSpot
description:
Fire Emblem Fortune's Weave is coming out in 2026 for the Nintendo Switch 2. It seems to take place in the Three Houses World or Universe.

#fireemblem #nintendodirect
title: Fire Emblem Fortune's Weave - What We Saw at Nintendo Direct

author: GameSpot
description: There was a brand-new Metroid Prime 4 Trailer, and we finally have a release date! December 4th. Samus also has a motorcycle now!
title: Metroid Prime 4 - Here's The Biggest Announcement

author: GameSpot
description:
Resident Evil Requiem is coming to the Nintendo Switch 2. Here are our reactions to the latest trailer and Resident Evil News.

#re9 #residentevil
title: Resident Evil Requiem (RE9) - Our Biggest Takeaways

author: GameSpot
description: Here Are All The Biggest Announcements From Nintendo's 60-minute Nintendo Direct. Mario's 40th anniversary, The Super Mario Galaxy Movie, Mario Tennis Fever, among others!
title: Nintendo Direct - Here Are All The Biggest Announcements

author: GameSpot
description:
We got an hour of Hands-on time with Donkey Kong Bananza's DLC Emerald Rush. Here are our biggest takeaways.

#bananza #donkeykongbananza
title: We Got Hands-On With The Donkey Kong Bananza DLC Emerald Rush

author: GameSpot
description: Donkey Kong Bananza roguelite mode DLC will let you smash stuff forever. Plus, a new DK Island is chock full of homages to classic games.
title: Donkey Kong Bananza Emerald Rush Turns The Game Into A Roguelite And It's Awesome

author: GameSpot
description:
Nintendo Direct 9/12/2025 celebrated Super Mario Bros. 40th birthday, bringing famed developer and creator of Mario, Shigeru Miyamoto, to host the party. Announcement after announcement, Nintendo revealed a lot of Mario games!

00:00 Intro
00:09 The Super Mario Galaxy Movie
01:14 Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2
03:46 Mario Tennis Fever
06:30 Super Mario Bros. Wonder
09:13 Talking Flower toy
09:41 Yoshi and the Mysterious Book
12:10 Storm Lancers
13:23 Dinkum
14:39 Popucom
15:38 Tomodachi Life Living the Dream
17:52 Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection
18:57 Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade
19:36 Lynked: Banner of the Spark
20:16 Hades 2 
22:59 Hyrule Warriors Age of Imprisonment
25:00 DragonQuest 7 Reimagined
27:05 Virtua Boy Nintendo Classics

30:42 Stardew Valley
31:00 Human fall flat
31:19 PowerWash Simulator 2
32:40 Suika Game Planet
33:43 Metroid Prime 4 Beyond
35:37 Donkey Ko
title: Every Announcement from the Nintendo Direct September 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
Behold the thrill of the Heroic Games! Discover an intertwining story of strength and steel in Fire Emblem: Fortune’s Weave, only on Nintendo Switch 2 next year.

#NintendoDirect #NintendoSwitch2 #FireEmblem
title: Fire Emblem: Fortune’s Weave - Official Announcement Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
*Footage from PC version.

Requiem for the dead. Nightmare for the living.

Resident Evil Requiem is the highly anticipated ninth title in the mainline Resident Evil series. Prepare to escape death in a heart-stopping experience that will chill you to your core.
 
A new era of survival horror begins when Resident Evil Requiem launches February 27, 2026 for PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S, Steam and Nintendo Switch™ 2.
title: Resident Evil Requiem (RE9) - Official 2nd Trailer
